name: general-legal-style
description: Sample FillWise ruleset for local testing

rules.name: Plain language for clauses
rules.description: Improve readability while preserving legal meaning.
rules.prompt_fragment: Rewrite the clause in plain legal language while preserving legal obligations, rights, party names, dates, and numeric values exactly.

rules.name: Keep defined terms consistent
rules.description: Preserve exact capitalization and wording of defined terms.
rules.prompt_fragment: Do not rename, re-capitalize, or alter any defined term; keep each defined term exactly as used in the original text.

rules.name: Clarify headings
rules.description: Make headings concise and clear without changing intent.
rules.prompt_fragment: Improve heading clarity and brevity while preserving legal intent and section meaning.

rules.name: No new obligations
rules.description: Prevent legal drift by disallowing new duties.
rules.prompt_fragment: Do not add any new legal obligation, duty, warranty, indemnity, or liability that is not explicitly present in the source text.
